## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/virtreginfo">VirtRegInfo</a> - Information about a virtual register used by a set of operands.

Definition at line 218 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

### Reads {#a0066fe4418e8c4c6c08dd9a9f2ee70e7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::VirtRegInfo::Reads">
Reads - One of the operands read the virtual register.

This does not include undef or internal use operands, see MO::readsReg().

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h/#l00221">221</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Tied {#a5a3349f5396be814b455f5f3a01f4efe}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::VirtRegInfo::Tied">
Tied - Uses and defs must use the same register.

This can be because of a two-address constraint, or there may be a partial redefinition of a sub-register.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h/#l00229">229</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### Writes {#acf7a0d275502415bb724169baf061638}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::VirtRegInfo::Writes">
Writes - One of the operands writes the virtual register.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h/#l00224">224</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineinstrbundle-h">MachineInstrBundle.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
